guideContainer.name: guide1
guideContainer.thankYouMessage: Thank you for submitting the form.

guidetextbox_3679022_1224896905.jcr:title: Text Box
guidetextbox_3679022_1224896905._value: Before you continue to the dashboard, you must confirm that all contact information is up to date in each section below.
guidetextbox_3679022_1224896905.name: txBeforeYouContinue

guidetextbox_3679022.jcr:title: Text Box
guidetextbox_3679022._value:
Please click the button "Continue to dashboard" to open the Global Affairs Canada dashboard.

Please note: it may take 10 seconds or more to retrieve your contact, account and Call for Proposal information.
guidetextbox_3679022.name: txPleaseContinue_copy_1

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"testjs();\\nconsole.log(\\"egcs_generallanguagepreference \\"+ egcs_generallanguagepreference.value);\\n\\n var contactArray = {\\n \\"firstname\\": firstname.value\,\\n \\"lastname\\": lastname.value\,\\n \\"emailaddress1\\": emailaddress1.value\,\\n \\"jobtitle\\": egcs_jobtitle_en.value\,\\n \\"telephone1\\": telephone1.value\,\\n \\"egcs_telephone1extension\\": egcs_telephone1extension.value\,\\n \\"egcs_generallanguagepreference\\": egcs_generallanguagepreference.value\,\\n \\"egcs_PrimaryAccount\\": { \\"accountid\\": vContactObj.egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid }\,\\n };\\n\\n var operationName = \\"PUT contact /contacts\\";\\n var operationArguments = JSON.stringify({\\n \\"contact_contactid\\": contactID.value\,\\n \\"contact\\": contactArray\\n\\t}); \\n\\nvar objData = execCRMService3Args(operationName\, operationArguments);\\n\\nconsole.log(\\"ContactObjData \\"+ objData);\\n\\n\\n\\n"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlContacts.pnlContactUpdate.putContact"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"testjs();\\n\\nvar vAccountId = sessionStorage.getItem(\\"accountid\\");\\n\\n var accountArray = { \\n \\"egcs_legalname\\": egcs_legalname.value\,\\n \\"name\\": operatingName.value\\n };\\nupdateAccountInfo(vAccountId\, accountArray);\\n\\n var addressArray = {\\n \\"gac_city\\": gac_city.value\,\\n \\"gac_streetaddress\\": gac_streetaddress.value\,\\n \\"gac_addressline2\\": gac_addressline2.value\,\\n \\"gac_postalcode\\": gac_postalcode.value\,\\n \\"gac_canadianprovinceterritory\\": gac_canadianprovinceterritory.value\,\\n \\"gac_addressid\\": gac_addressid.value\\n };\\nupdateAccountAddress(gac_addressid.value\, addressArray);\\n\\n\\n"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlContacts.pnlAccountUpdate.updateContact"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

guidetelephone_copy.jcr:title: Telephone Number (Mandatory)
guidetelephone_copy.name: telephone1New
guidetelephone_copy.validatePictureClauseMessage: Please enter a valid phone number (999-999-9999).

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"testjs();\\n\\n var contactArray = {\\n \\"firstname\\": firstnameNew.value\,\\n \\"lastname\\": lastnameNew.value\,\\n \\"emailaddress1\\": emailaddress1New.value\,\\n \\"jobtitle\\": egcs_jobtitle_en_New.value\,\\n \\"telephone1\\": telephone1New.value\,\\n \\"egcs_telephone1extension\\": egcs_telephone1extensionNew.value\,\\n \\"egcs_generallanguagepreference\\": egcs_generallanguagepreferenceNew.value\,\\n \\"egcs_PrimaryAccount\\": { \\"accountid\\": vContactObj.egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid }\,\\n };\\n\\n var formData = JSON.stringify({\\n \\"contact\\": contactArray\,\\n });\\n\\n var operationName = \\"POST contact /contacts\\";\\n var objData = execCRMService3Args(operationName\, formData);\\n\\nconsole.log(\\"ContactObjData \\"+ objData);\\n\\n\\n"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlContacts.pnlNewContact.postContact"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

guidetextbox_3679022.jcr:title: Text Box
guidetextbox_3679022._value:
Please click the button "Continue to dashboard" to open the Global Affairs Canada dashboard.

Please note: it may take 10 seconds or more to retrieve your contact, account and Call for Proposal information.
guidetextbox_3679022.name: txPleaseContinue

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"//Note: \\"wcmmode=disabled\\" DO NOT USE WITH DISPATCHER\\n\\nconsole.log(\\"ceciindex->Continue to dashboard - Click-Jul5a-2022\\");\\n//sessionStorage.setItem(\\"eamid\\"\, EAMID.value);\\n\\n//Aug3-cs-removed 'wcmmode=disabled' per request from PatV since AEM Dispatcher Blocks it.\\n//Aug3-bb-added the following line to fetch URL param 'afAcceptLang'\, then append to destination URL\, to support language workflow.\\n//Aug3-cs-Note to use 'lang' setting you need 'urlParams' setting as well.\\n//\\nvar urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar lang = urlParams.get('afAcceptLang');\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"lang\\"\,lang); //- bb-Sep2\\n\\n//window.open('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/ceci/landingPageDec1a/jcr:content?' + 'afAcceptLang=' +lang\,'_self');\\n// testing for 5147: Update to landingPageMar3a for Claims starting Apr 1 2023\\nwindow.open('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/ceci/landingPageMar3a/jcr:content?' + 'afAcceptLang=' +lang\,'_self');\\n\\n//NOTE the above form is \\n//window.open('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/ceci/landingPage/jcr:content?' + 'afAcceptLang=' +lang\,'_self');\\n//window.open('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/ceci/landingPageJan13a/jcr:content?' + 'afAcceptLang=' +lang\,'_self');\\n\\n//the below was used PRIOR to \\"Claims\\" integration -->> note \\"landingPageJan13a\\" is in /ceci/ folder\, as well as /developers/besco/\\n//window.open('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/ceci/landingPage/jcr:content?' + 'afAcceptLang=' +lang\,'_self');\\n//window.open('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/ceci/landingPage/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled&afDebug&afAcceptLang=en'\,'_self');\\n\\n\\n//Below opens in NEW tab --> Works nicely\\n//guidelib.util.GuideUtil.navigateToURL('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/besco/indexlanding/landingpagedec30ajan29a/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled'\,'_self');\\n"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.continue2dashboard"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

guidetextdraw_1904135126._value: Connection issue occured. Please try again later. / Une erreur de connexion s’est produite. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.
guidetextdraw_1904135126.name: txConnectionIssue

afformtitle.text: Jan18b - Besco says: autojump to LandingPage shortly

fd:scripts.fd:init: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"console.log(\\"CeciIndex\\" + \\": \\" + \\"Root Panel - Initialize\\" + \\": \\" + \\"** CECI Build\\" + \\" \\" + \\"Mar22A\\" + \\" \\" + \\"2023\\");\\ntestjs();\\n//cbCertifyContact.value = 0;\\n//cbCertifyAccount.value = 0;\\ncontinue2dashboard.visible = true;\\ncontinue2dashboard.enable = false;\\n\\nvar uid = location.search.split(\\"uid=\\")[1]; // UID from URL\\nif (uid === null) { console.log(\\"uid is 'null' ---> Check PortalBroker\\"); }\\nelse {\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"eamid\\"\, uid);\\n\\n txConnectionIssue.visible = false; //red msg\\n\\n var vStrAfAcceptLang = vLang === \\"en\\" ? \\"Please wait...\\" : \\"Patienter svp...\\";\\n\\n guidelib.util.GuideUtil.showGuideLoading(true).showMessages(vStrAfAcceptLang);\\n setTimeout(function () {\\n // init code here\\n // var vContactObj declared in fdnfuncs.js to create \\"global\\" var\\n vContactObj = getContactAcctFromEamId(uid);\\n /*\\n * Triple condition:\\n 1- the eamharness is BRAND NEW\, not found in CRM --- \\"null\\" is returned \\n */\\n if (vContactObj === null || vContactObj === \\"\\") { // does NOT show contact name or Organizationname\\n console.log(\\"vContactObj is null or empty string\\" + vContactObj);\\n cbCertifyContact.value = 1;\\n cbCertifyAccount.value = 1;\\n pnlAccountContact2.visible = false;\\n txConnectionIssue.visible = false; //red msg\\n txLoginSuccessful.visible = true;\\n continue2dashboard.visible = true;\\n continue2dashboard.enable = true;\\n txPleaseContinue.visible = true;\\n pnlContacts.visible = false;\\n txBeforeYouContinue.visible = false;\\n }\\n else {\\n // the FDM data is EITHER JSON object OR errormessage text \\n //2- the FDM is NOT responding... \\"errormessage...\\"\\n // ONLY if FDM is failing authentication \\n if (vContactObj == \\"errorMessage\\") { // ONLY if FDM is failing authentication\\n console.log(\\"vContactObj is: \\" + vContactObj);\\n txConnectionIssue.visible = true; //red msg\\n txLoginSuccessful.visible = false;\\n pnlAccountContact2.visible = false;\\n continue2dashboard.visible = false;\\n txPleaseContinue.visible = false;\\n }\\n else {\\n //3-the eamharness exists in CRM and contactObj has JSON data\\n //show AND disable button \\"Continue to dashboard\\n //show \\"Login successful\\n //show text for Global affairs...\\n //hide red error text\\n //\\n //This is the original code... exists in the new 'besco..' form\\n console.log(\\"vContactObj is: \\" + vContactObj);\\n var vAccountId = sessionStorage.getItem(\\"accountid\\");\\n var accountObj = getAccountObj(vAccountId);\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac_SigningAuthority\\"\, accountObj.gac_SigningAuthority.fullname);\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"primaryContact\\"\, accountObj.primarycontactid.fullname);\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"ssGac_organizationshortname\\"\, accountObj.gac_organizationshortname);\\n txLoginSuccessful.visible = true;\\n pnlAccountContact2.visible = true;\\n continue2dashboard.visible = false;\\n continue2dashboard.enable = false;\\n txPleaseContinue.visible = false;\\n txConnectionIssue.visible = false; //red msg\\n\\n contactID.value = vContactObj.contactid;\\n pnlAccountContact2.visible = true;\\n pnlAccountContact2.fullname.value = vContactObj.fullname;\\n egcs_operatingname_en.value = vContactObj.egcs_PrimaryAccount.egcs_operatingname_en; //egcs_operatingname_en\\n primaryAcctPrimContContID.value = vContactObj.egcs_PrimaryAccount.primarycontactid.contactid;\\n pnlContacts.pnlContactUpdate.firstname.value = vContactObj.firstname;\\n pnlContacts.pnlContactUpdate.lastname.value = vContactObj.lastname;\\n pnlContacts.pnlContactUpdate.emailaddress1.value = vContactObj.emailaddress1;\\n pnlContacts.pnlContactUpdate.egcs_jobtitle_en.value = vContactObj.egcs_jobtitle_en;\\n pnlContacts.pnlContactUpdate.telephone1.value = vContactObj.telephone1;\\n pnlContacts.pnlContactUpdate.egcs_telephone1extension.value = vContactObj.egcs_telephone1extension;\\n pnlContacts.pnlContactUpdate.egcs_generallanguagepreference.value = vContactObj.egcs_generallanguagepreference;\\n\\n if (contactID.value == primaryAcctPrimContContID.value) {\\n pnlNewContact.visible = true;\\n // btGetAccount.visible = true;\\n\\n pnlContacts.pnlAccountUpdate.egcs_legalname.value = accountObj.gac_legalname_en;\\n pnlContacts.pnlAccountUpdate.operatingName.value = accountObj.egcs_operatingname_en;\\n pnlContacts.pnlAccountUpdate.gac_streetaddress.value = accountObj.gac_PrimaryAddress.gac_streetaddress;\\n pnlContacts.pnlAccountUpdate.gac_addressline2.value = accountObj.gac_PrimaryAddress.gac_addressline2;\\n pnlContacts.pnlAccountUpdate.gac_city.value = accountObj.gac_PrimaryAddress.gac_city;\\n pnlContacts.pnlAccountUpdate.gac_postalcode.value = accountObj.gac_PrimaryAddress.gac_postalcode;\\n pnlContacts.pnlAccountUpdate.gac_canadianprovinceterritory.value = accountObj.gac_PrimaryAddress.gac_canadianprovinceterritory;\\n pnlContacts.pnlAccountUpdate.gac_addressid.value = accountObj.gac_PrimaryAddress.gac_addressid;\\n pnlContacts.pnlAccountUpdate.visible = true;\\n pnlContacts.pnlAccountUpdate.cbCertifyAccount.value = 0;\\n\\n }\\n else { // the contact is NOT PRIMARY\\n pnlNewContact.visible = false;\\n cbCertifyAccount.value = \\"1\\"; // to \\"fool\\" condition for continue2dashboard enabling\\n // btGetAccount.visible = false;\\n pnlContacts.pnlAccountUpdate.visible = false;\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n // init code here\\n guidelib.util.GuideUtil.showGuideLoading(false); // take down the window disable\\n }\,\\n 1000\\n );\\n}\\n"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
